ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: Pilar is an absolute joy! She is an excellent professor and goes out of her way to help students.
More advanced Spanish grammar - builds really well on L1.
I developed skills of participation and thinking on my feet during class.
SPAN 120 with Pilar vastly improved my Spanish skills.
I learned a lot of new tenses and vocabulary.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Very transparent, small class sizes are a significant plus compared to a lot of intros at Yale. Gives a very comprehensive grammar overview! Teaching is at a very high level as well.
The strengths of this course are its organization and the instructor.
Even though it's sometimes a drag, having class five times a day is a plus. You learn that much more Spanish and there is more time to do things like practice conversational skills.
This was a very strong course, I felt that I learned a lot.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Absolutely yes -- Pilar is perfect -- everything you could ever want in a college instructor and human being. The class is a standard intro/intermediate Spanish course but it is very well executed and taught.
Yes if they are taking a language the Spanish L2 is very well organized.
Definitely! Take it with Pilar if you can. She is very knowledgeable and approachable.

Yes, I would recommend this course to another student interested in improving their Spanish. I highly recommend taking it with Pilar! She is very kind and excellent at explaining concepts. I looked forward to going to class each day because of her positive attitude.
